item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

joelx617:

how could i port foward without a router?

Utorrent… is a decent way to do it… could set up hamachi heavily not suggested…

uhh what else… pretty much the only ways i know how too…

item.title: For my no-ip account for server should i put my router's ip or my computer's ip?
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

joelx617:

ok but in my client.java file should i put the ip in my no-ip such as myserver.no-ip.biz? or the number ips like 127.0.0.0?

You relize no-ip address and your real ip address is exactly the same right?
…

well… it goes to no-ip.biz then it gets its zonefile which will redirect your information to your ipaddress with an A record… but yes same end results…

WhatIsMyIPAddress.com

What Is My IP Address? IP Address Tools and More

IP address lookup, location, proxy detection, email tracing, IP hiding tips, blacklist check, speed test, and forums. Find, get, and show my IP address.

Read full topic

item.title: For my no-ip account for server should i put my router's ip or my computer's ip?
item.dc:creator: @iCharizard iCharizard
item.description:
@iCharizard wrote:

I don’t anything about Netgear, but I don’t see the point of using no-ip.biz such things, as you can easily go on whatsmyip.org and resolve them to your actual ip address
